title: srI saraswathi namOsthuthE
sahitya:
shrI saraswati namOstutE varadE paradEvatE shrIpati gaurIpati guruguha vinutE vidhiyuvatE







samaashTi caraNam







vAsanAtraya vivarjita varamuni bhAvita mUrttE vAsavAdyakhila

nirjara vara vitaraNa bahukIrttE dharahAsayuta mukhAmbhOruhE adbhuta

caraNAmbhOruhE samsAra bhItyApahE sakala mantrAkSara guhE
